content: Hi. It looks like some of the bundled templates - e.g. Meeting Notes - have been changed. Would it be possible to get a heads up that these are changing, being removed, etc.? Even better would be to be engaged to provide input.

The Meeting Notes Template, Jira Decision Template, Retrospective Template, How-To Template, and Task Report Template removals were in error and have been restored. Thank you for bringing this to our attention! The other templates, have been found to be duplicates to other custom global templates within HL7 (PSS, decisions, agenda's, attendance...etc) and have been removed.
Hi - Any chance this is affecting the WGM Attendence template? I am having trouble adding it?
I get the Create screen, but I just get a spinner and nothing ever returns.
Although Josh Procious is best for help with this issue, the spinner problem causes me to remember an early issue
by chance is there a :8090 or :8080 in your address bar for the URL?
No sir
Because if there is there shouldn't be. :slight_smile: There were a few bookmarks out there that still had it.
I am boarding a flight, so won't be able to respond for a while :)
Josh should be in San Antonio now. I'll send a shoutout indicating you have a question
Well, I guarantee he will be on site and ready to help with just this type of issue
It may be best to take the flight, and meet up with Josh at the meeting. He'll be there the entire time ready to help
I will see if I can find him, thanks David.

@Joshua Procious - any chance you can look at this? I am still unable to create our attendance document.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGW/2019-01+CG+WGM+Agenda
Good morning Kevin,

I've added the new attendance log to that button. However, a better practice moving forward will be to create from the ellipsis in the top center of the screen. Here is some helpful documentation on it : https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HDH/How+to+Use+2019+WGM+Attendance
Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks @Joshua Procious - I followed the better practice, do I need to manually update the Agenda now to include a link to the attendance? I don't think I want to leave the button there and allow someone to create another attendance document.
actually, never mind. I updated the content label. Thanks!
Ok very good! Let me know if you have any questions.
Tooling Documenation here: http://www.hl7.org/documentcenter/public_temp_7E2D48E5-1C23-BA17-0C3356AA8033F8D2/membership/HL7_Processes_and_Tools_Conceptual_Modelv1.1.pdf
